advice.pattern: Database not found or no system permission
advice.message: The database field may be wrong.

advice.pattern: INFORMIXSERVER does not match either DBSERVERNAME or DBSERVERALIASES
advice.message: Usually is 'informix'. Look for the variable DBSERVERNAME in the file $INFORMIXSERVER/etc/onconfig.
Choose to edit the JDBC URL and add these parameters: ;DB_LOCALE=us_US.CP1250;CLIENT_LOCALE=us_US.CP1250;charSet=CP1250
Please disable transactions from Model/Settings/Informix Settings/Disable AutoCommit
